content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the rental price for this apartment is not cheap. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like the supermarket, public transportation, etc. So, what is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your honesty. I am a student and I am looking for a place that would be a little cheaper because I have a tight budget. I really like the apartment, but I would like to propose 450 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty as well. However, considering the conditions of my apartment, I can't accept such a low offer. I'm sure you understand that the location and condition of the apartment are quite attractive. I'll give you a counteroffer of 650 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your quick response. I understand your point. However, I am really on a tight budget because I am a student. Would you be willing to accept 500 euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I respect your situation as a student, but 500 euros per month is still a significant discount from my counteroffer. If you insist, I can meet you halfway at 600 euros per month. I believe it's a fair price for such an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for understanding. 600 euros per month sounds very reasonable to me. I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [600] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mister Schmidt. I am very pleased with the outcome of our negotiation. I am sure we will have a good relationship in the future.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: You're welcome, Yi-Nuo Wang. I hope we will indeed have a good relationship in the future. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact me. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
